JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities:    Create architectural designs for complex applications and features   Work on complex services and web pages using C# and ASP.Net MVC   End to end design, development, stabilization and enhancement of .Net Applications   Create data model design, SQL Queries and/or Stored Procedures   Lead and participate in technical and operations reviews   Create and manage automated deployments   Build and share reusable components   Knowledge sharing and training the team on your specialized skills   3+ years technology development experience in ASP .Net MVC using C#   Expertise in using WCF, LINQ, jQuery   Experience in using CSS   Hands on in SQL CRUD operations and query optimization   Excellent understanding of Object Oriented Programming   Excellent Problem Solving Skills with ability to handle and address complexity under pressure   Excellent written and verbal communication skills   Experience in Banking or Finance Domain   Working experience in SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) & SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)   Experience in working on JIRA and Confluence
